rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with open plan and wheelchair accessible ramp.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Modern living area with large windows ensuring natural light in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for easy family interaction; open plan design.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with wheelchair accessible countertops and storage designed per local norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious bedroom located in the north-east corner for positive energy according to Vastu. Includes en-suite bathroom with accessible features.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed for privacy and tranquility.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Another room ensuring personal space; placed in line with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Fourth bedroom with integrated storage and accessibility features.

rooms.name: Family Bathroom
rooms.description: Spacious bathroom for family use; wheelchair accessible design.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Dedicated library space with built-in shelves and quiet ambience located in the south-east corner for calm energy.

rooms.name: Service Quarters
rooms.description: Quarters for domestic help; includes a small kitchenette and sleeping area.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance door with automatic features and ample landing space.

openings.name: Balcony Access Doors
openings.description: Access to the balcony overlooking the swimming pool area.

openings.name: Swimming Pool Entrance Door
openings.description: Direct access door from the living room to the outdoor swimming pool; includes ramp for wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Service Quarters Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional space in the servant's quarters for sleeping; designed with accessibility in mind.

rooms.name: Pantry
rooms.description: Storage area for food supplies accessible from the kitchen.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Area designated for laundry and other household appliances; designed with local building norms in mind.

openings.name: Underground Access Door
openings.location: North side of the lower floor
openings.description: Door for access to basement storage and service areas.

rooms.name: Split Level Transition
rooms.description: Area that connects the ground and upper floors; designed with smooth transitions for wheelchair accessibility.
